nodes.text: Dugar dugar were a species of deerlike creature native to the planet Batuu. Their calls could be heard from within Black Spire Outpost. Some residents of Batuu raised dugar dugar to become pets or for other reasons.

Dugar dugar were created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. While not physically present in the park, sound clips of the creatures' calls can be heard in certain areas.
